name: cat beanie
notes:
**keep in mind**
there are countless patterns for cat beanies everywhere that come down to crocheting a simple rectangle and sewing it shut, leaving one wide opening at the bottom. i freehanded this one, but it's so simple that there is a chance someone came up with something similar before i did so as well. 

this pattern uses the **american crochet terminology**.

**hook size** = 5mm
**yarn recommendation** 
weight 2 double stranded (e.g. yarnart baby, petalouda standard, etc) about **220m or 240yds** total (110m or 120yds each strand)

or

weight 4-5 single stranded (e.g. kartopu melange wool, kartopu alpaca polo, etc) about **100m or 110yds**

**abbreviations**
ch - chain
st/sts - stitch/stitches
dc - double crochet
stsc - stacked single crochet
dc2tog - double crochet 2 together (decrease)

**size of the finished beanie laying flat:**
28cm wide x 18cm long (11" wide x 7" long)

any questions, comments, concerns? feel free to contact me!
- [kami crochet][1]


  [1]: https://linktr.ee/kami_crochet
